original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena siṅgālako gahapatiputto kālasseva uṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavattho allakeso pañjaliko puthudisā namassati—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena siṅgālakaḥ gahapati putto kālassa iva uṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavatthaḥ alla keso pañjalikaḥ puthudisā namassati

original: puratthimaṁ disaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ pacchimaṁ disaṁ uttaraṁ disaṁ heṭṭhimaṁ disaṁ uparimaṁ disaṁ.
analyzed: puratthimam disam dakkhiṇam disam pacchimam disam uttaram disam heṭṭhimam disam uparimam

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya rājagaham piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Addasā kho bhagavā siṅgālakaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ kālasseva vuṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavatthaṁ allakesaṁ pañjalikaṁ puthudisā namassantaṁ—
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā siṅgālakam gahapati puttam kālassa iva vuṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavattham allakesam pañjalikam puthudisā namassanta

original: puratthimaṁ disaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ pacchimaṁ disaṁ uttaraṁ disaṁ heṭṭhimaṁ disaṁ uparimaṁ disaṁ.
analyzed: puratthimam disam dakkhiṇam disam pacchimam disam uttaram disam heṭṭhimam disam uparimam
disvā siṅgālakam gahapati puttam etat avoca

original: “kiṁ nu kho tvaṁ, gahapatiputta, kālasseva vuṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavattho allakeso pañjaliko puthudisā namassasi—
analyzed: kim nu kho tva gahapati putta kālassa iva vuṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavatthaḥ alla keso pañjaliko puthudisā namassasi

original: puratthimaṁ disaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ pacchimaṁ disaṁ uttaraṁ disaṁ heṭṭhimaṁ disaṁ uparimaṁ disan”ti?
analyzed: puratthimam disam dakkhiṇam disam pacchimam disam uttaram disam heṭṭhimam disam uparimam disanti

original: “Pitā maṁ, bhante, kālaṁ karonto evaṁ avaca:
analyzed: pitā ma bhante kālam karontaḥ evam avaca

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, pituvacanaṁ sakkaronto garuṁ karonto mānento pūjento kālasseva uṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavattho allakeso pañjaliko puthudisā namassāmi—
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhante pitu vacanam sakkarontaḥ garum karontaḥ mānentaḥ pūjentaḥ kālassa iva uṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavatthaḥ alla keso pañjaliko puthudisā namassāmi

original: puratthimaṁ disaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ pacchimaṁ disaṁ uttaraṁ disaṁ heṭṭhimaṁ disaṁ uparimaṁ disan”ti.
analyzed: puratthimam disam dakkhiṇam disam pacchimam disam uttaram disam heṭṭhimam disam uparimam disanti

original: “Na kho, gahapatiputta, ariyassa vinaye evaṁ cha disā namassitabbā”ti.
analyzed: na kho gahapati putta ariyassa vinaye evam cha disāḥ namassitabbā ati

original: “Yathā kathaṁ pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye cha disā namassitabbā?
analyzed: yathā katham pana bhante ariyassa vinaye cha disāḥ namassitabbā

original: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā tathā dhammaṁ desetu, yathā ariyassa vinaye cha disā namassitabbā”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhante bhagavā tathā dhammam desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye cha disāḥ namassitabbā ati

original: “Tena hi, gahapatiputta, suṇohi sādhukaṁ manasikarohi bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi gahapati putta suṇohi sādhukam manasikarohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho siṅgālako gahapatiputto bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho siṅgālakaḥ gahapati putto bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: “Yato kho, gahapatiputta, ariyasāvakassa cattāro kammakilesā pahīnā honti, catūhi
analyzed: yatas kho gahapatiputta ariyasāvakassa cattāro kamma kilesā pahīnāḥ honti catūhi

analyzed: ca ṭhānehi pāpa kammam na karoti cha ca bhogānaṃ apāya mukhāni na sevati saḥ eva

original: ubholokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti. Tassa ayañceva loko āraddho hoti paro ca loko.
analyzed: ubholoka vijayāya paṭipanno hoti tassa ayaṃ ca iva lokaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti paraḥ ca loko

original: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.

original: Pāṇātipāto kho, gahapatiputta, kammakileso, adinnādānaṁ kammakileso, kāmesumicchācāro kammakileso, musāvādo kammakileso.
analyzed: pāṇātipāto kho gahapati putta kamma kilesaḥ adinnādānam kamma kilesaḥ kāmesu micchācāraḥ kamma kilesaḥ musāvādaḥ kamma kilesaḥ
imassa cattāro kamma kilesā pahīnāḥ honti iti

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:

katamehi catūhi ṭhānehi pāpa kammam na karoti

analyzed: chandāgatim gacchantaḥ pāpa kammam karoti dosāgatim gacchantaḥ pāpa kammam karoti mohāgatim gacchantaḥ pāpa kammam karoti bhayāgatim gacchantaḥ pāpa kammam karoti

original: Yato kho, gahapatiputta, ariyasāvako neva chandāgatiṁ gacchati, na dosāgatiṁ gacchati, na mohāgatiṁ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṁ gacchati;
analyzed: yatas kho gahapati putta ariya sāvakaḥ na iva chanda āgatim gacchati na dosa āgatim gacchati na moha āgatim gacchati na bhaya āgatim gacchati

original: imehi catūhi ṭhānehi pāpakammaṁ na karotī”ti.
analyzed: imehi catūhi ṭhānehi pāpa kammam na karoti iti

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:

original: Surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānānuyogo kho, gahapatiputta, bhogānaṁ apāyamukhaṁ, vikālavisikhācariyānuyogo

analyzed: bhogānaṃ apāya mukha pāpa mitta anuyogaḥ bhogānaṃ apāya mukhaḥ ālasya anuyogaḥ bhogānaṃ apāya mukha

analyzed: kva nacca kva gīta kva vādita kva akkhāna kva pāṇissara kva kumbhathunanti

akkhadhuttaḥ ayam purisa puggalaḥ na alam dāra bharaṇāya ati

original: Atisītanti kammaṁ na karoti, atiuṇhanti kammaṁ na karoti, atisāyanti kammaṁ na karoti, atipātoti kammaṁ na karoti, atichātosmīti kammaṁ na karoti, atidhātosmīti kammaṁ na karoti.

veditabbā uparimā disā samaṇa brāhmaṇā veditabbā

original: Pañcahi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātāpitaro paccupaṭṭhātabbā—
analyzed: pañcahi kho gahapati putta ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātā pitaro paccupaṭṭhātabbā

original: bhato ne bharissāmi, kiccaṁ nesaṁ karissāmi, kulavaṁsaṁ ṭhapessāmi, dāyajjaṁ paṭipajjāmi, atha vā pana petānaṁ kālaṅkatānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ anuppadassāmīti.
analyzed: bhato ne bharissāmi kiccam nesam karissāmi kula vasam ṭhapessāmi dāyajjam paṭipajjāmi atha vā pana petānam kālaṅkatānam dakkhiṇam anuppadassāmi iti

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātāpitaro paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi puttaṁ anukampanti.
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātā pitaro paccupaṭṭhitāḥ pañcahi ṭhānehi puttam anukampanti

original: Pāpā nivārenti, kalyāṇe nivesenti, sippaṁ sikkhāpenti, patirūpena dārena saṁyojenti, samaye dāyajjaṁ niyyādenti.
analyzed: pāpāḥ nivārenti kalyāṇe nivesenti sippam sikkhāpenti pati rūpena dārena sayojenti samaye dāyajjam niyyādenti

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātāpitaro paccupaṭṭhitā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi puttaṁ anukampanti.
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātā pitaro paccupaṭṭhitāḥ imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi puttam anukampanti

original: Evamassa esā puratthimā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā.
analyzed: evam assa esā puratthimā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā

original: Pañcahi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi antevāsinā dakkhiṇā disā ācariyā paccupaṭṭhātabbā—
analyzed: pañcahi kho gahapatiputta ṭhānehi antevāsinā dakkhiṇā disā ācariyā paccupaṭṭhātabbā

original: uṭṭhānena upaṭṭhānena sussusāya pāricariyāya sakkaccaṁ sippapaṭiggahaṇena.
analyzed: uṭṭhānena upaṭṭhānena sussusāya pāricariyāya sakkaccam sippa paṭiggahaṇena

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi antevāsinā dakkhiṇā disā ācariyā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi antevāsiṁ anukampanti—
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi antevāsinā dakkhiṇā disā ācariyā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi antevāsim anukampanti

original: suvinītaṁ vinenti, suggahitaṁ gāhāpenti, sabbasippassutaṁ samakkhāyino bhavanti, mittāmaccesu paṭiyādenti, disāsu parittāṇaṁ karonti.
analyzed: su vinītam vinenti su gahitam gāhāpenti sabba sippa ssutam samakkhāyinaḥ bhavanti mitta amaccesu paṭiyādenti disāsu parittāṇam karonti

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi antevāsinā dakkhiṇā disā ācariyā paccupaṭṭhitā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi antevāsiṁ anukampanti.
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi antevāsinā dakkhiṇā disā ācariyā paccupaṭṭhitāḥ imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi antevāsim anukampanti

original: Evamassa esā dakkhiṇā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā.
analyzed: evam assa esā dakkhiṇā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā

original: Pañcahi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi sāmikena pacchimā disā bhariyā paccupaṭṭhātabbā—
analyzed: pañcahi kho gahapati putta ṭhānehi sāmikena pacchimā disā bhariyā paccupaṭṭhātabbā
sammānanāya an avamānanāya an aticariyāya issariya vossaggena alaṅkāra an uppadānena

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikena pacchimā disā bhariyā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikaṁ anukampati—
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikena pacchimā disā bhariyā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikam anukampati

original: susaṁvihitakammantā ca hoti, saṅgahitaparijanā ca, anaticārinī ca, sambhatañca anurakkhati, dakkhā ca hoti analasā sabbakiccesu.
analyzed: su sa vihita kammantā ca hoti saṅgahita parijanā ca an aticārinī ca sambhatam ca anurakkhati dakkhā ca hoti analasā sabba kiccesu

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikena pacchimā disā bhariyā paccupaṭṭhitā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikaṁ anukampati.
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikena pacchimā disā bhariyā paccupaṭṭhitā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikam anukampati

original: Evamassa esā pacchimā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā.
analyzed: evam assa esā pacchimā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā

original: Pañcahi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi kulaputtena uttarā disā mittāmaccā paccupaṭṭhātabbā—
analyzed: pañcahi kho gahapati putta ṭhānehi kula puttena uttarā disā mitta amaccā paccupaṭṭhātabbā
dānena peyyavajjena attha cariyāya samānatta tāya a visavādana tāya

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi kulaputtena uttarā disā mittāmaccā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi kulaputtaṁ anukampanti—
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi kula puttena uttarā disā mittāmaccā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi kula puttam anukampanti

original: pamattaṁ rakkhanti, pamattassa sāpateyyaṁ rakkhanti, bhītassa saraṇaṁ honti, āpadāsu na vijahanti, aparapajā cassa paṭipūjenti.
analyzed: pamattam rakkhanti pamattassa sāpateyyam rakkhanti bhītassa saraṇam honti āpadāsu na vijahanti aparapajāḥ ca ssa paṭipūjenti

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi kulaputtena uttarā disā mittāmaccā paccupaṭṭhitā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi kulaputtaṁ anukampanti.
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi kula puttena uttarā disā mitta amaccā paccupaṭṭhitā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi kula puttam anukampanti

original: Evamassa esā uttarā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā.
analyzed: evam assa esā uttarā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā

original: Pañcahi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi ayyirakena heṭṭhimā disā dāsakammakarā paccupaṭṭhātabbā—
analyzed: pañcahi kho gahapati putta ṭhānehi ayyirakena heṭṭhimā disā dāsa kamma karā paccupaṭṭhātabbā

original: yathābalaṁ kammantasaṁvidhānena bhattavetanānuppadānena gilānupaṭṭhānena acchariyānaṁ rasānaṁ saṁvibhāgena samaye vossaggena.
analyzed: yathābalam kammanta savidhānena bhatta vetana anuppadānena gilāna upaṭṭhānena acchariyānam rasānam savibhāgena samaye vossaggena

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi ayyirakena heṭṭhimā disā dāsakammakarā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi ayyirakaṁ anukampanti—
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi ayyirakena heṭṭhimā disā dāsa kamma karā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi ayyirakam anukampanti

original: pubbuṭṭhāyino ca honti, pacchā nipātino ca, dinnādāyino ca, sukatakammakarā ca, kittivaṇṇaharā ca.
analyzed: pubbuṭṭhāyino ca honti pacchā nipātino ca dinna ādāyino ca su kata kamma karā ca kitti vaṇṇa harā ca

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi ayyirakena heṭṭhimā disā dāsakammakarā paccupaṭṭhitā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi ayyirakaṁ anukampanti.
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi ayyirakena heṭṭhimā disā dāsa kamma karā paccupaṭṭhitāḥ imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi ayyirakam anukampanti

original: Evamassa esā heṭṭhimā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā.
analyzed: evam assa esā heṭṭhimā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā

original: Pañcahi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi kulaputtena uparimā disā samaṇabrāhmaṇā paccupaṭṭhātabbā—
analyzed: pañcahi kho gahapati putta ṭhānehi kula puttena uparimā disā samaṇa brāhmaṇā paccupaṭṭhātabbā

original: mettena kāyakammena mettena vacīkammena mettena manokammena anāvaṭadvāratāya āmisānuppadānena.
analyzed: mettena kāya kammena mettena vacī kammena mettena manaḥ kammena anāvaṭa dvāra tāya āmisa an uppadānena

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi kulaputtena uparimā disā samaṇabrāhmaṇā paccupaṭṭhitā chahi ṭhānehi kulaputtaṁ anukampanti—
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi kula puttena uparimā disā samaṇa brāhmaṇā paccupaṭṭhitā chahi ṭhānehi kula puttam anukampanti

original: pāpā nivārenti, kalyāṇe nivesenti, kalyāṇena manasā anukampanti, assutaṁ sāventi, sutaṁ pariyodāpenti, saggassa maggaṁ ācikkhanti.
analyzed: pāpāḥ nivārenti kalyāṇe nivesenti kalyāṇena manasā anukampanti a sutam sāventi sutam pariyodāpenti saggassa maggaṃ ācikkhanti

original: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi kulaputtena uparimā disā samaṇabrāhmaṇā paccupaṭṭhitā imehi chahi ṭhānehi kulaputtaṁ anukampanti.
analyzed: imehi kho gahapati putta pañcahi ṭhānehi kula puttena uparimā disā samaṇa brāhmaṇā paccupaṭṭhitāḥ imehi chahi ṭhānehi kula puttam anukampanti

original: Evamassa esā uparimā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā”ti.
analyzed: evam assa esā uparimā disā paṭicchannā hoti khemā appaṭibhayā ati

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ atha aparam etat avoca satthā

original: Evaṁ vutte, siṅgālako gahapatiputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte siṅgālakaḥ gahapati puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhante nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa

original: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti
evam evam bhagavatā aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Esāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: esā aha bhante bhagavantam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu, ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇa upetam saraṇam gatanti
